name: Tourist Bus Simulator 2017
description:
Improve your bus driving skills and provide tourist fast transport service in hilltop and mountains and make their journey interesting and adventurous by playing our brand new tourist bus simulator 2017.
Go drive on zigzag road on hills and mountain tops and make tourist’s journey more exciting and crazy. Pick passengers form different bus stops, show them amazing places and drop them to their destinations.
Tourist bus game simulator is full of thrill and adventure; the animations will make you feel like driving a real bus.
Play our modern bus driving simulator game and drive our beautiful and brand new tourist bus to fulfill the bus driving duty Take the passengers from the bus stops and drive them to their destination places and complete your level and advance to new and exciting levels and unlock more buses.
As a driver you have to make sure that your tourist is safe, as the path is surrounded by river, hills and mountains, so be careful!

This game is realistic and has amazing HD graphics. Tourist Bus simulator game will advance your bus driving experience. It will help to boost your confidence and increase your bus driving skills.

It really engages the user into the game constantly demanding attention of the driver to drive safe. The animations of tourist make you really feel like you are into the game. Bus doors opens and closes automatically after loading the passengers. The dynamic camera angles enhance that experience of reality. Drive your Bus and complete your level and unlock other Buses.

Driving on the hillside tracks and mountain tops with bus full of passengers is not an easy job. This game also tests your driving skills so you have to drive carefully and smartly to avoid falling or having an accident!

Initially all levels are locked except the first, you have to complete every level to unlock the next one till you complete all the levels.
After selecting the level, it shows different control options
• Arrows
• Steering Wheel
• Accelerometer, to drive the bus by tilting or rotating the phone in the direction you want to turn the bus.

When the game starts and you are on a road with beautiful terrain and river by the side. Along with the steering/arrows/tilt option two pedals are displayed, one is for gas and one is for brake. A gearbox is also displayed which allows you to change the gear to either move forward or backward. You can also click on camera to change camera view.

As you move forward the fuel decreases and you have to collect fuel to refuel your bus. As you progress you have to stop the bus at the bus stop so the passengers can enter or exit the bus automatically. When all the passengers are loaded in the bus you have to drive to drop them to their destinations and complete the level. It’s easy, isn’t it!


Features
• Tourist animations
• Fuel consumptions
• High quality resolution
• HD graphics
• Different camera modes
• Beautiful landscape
• Amazing background sound.
• Different control options

So what are you waiting for? Download tourist bus simulator game 2017 now and test your bus driving skills.
Be careful while driving to avoid accidents and drive safe!
Make sure your tourists are safe and sound.
